thread.title: Regenerative medicine company Cesca Therapeutics secures $15mm in debt
thread.title_full: Regenerative medicine company Cesca Therapeutics secures $15mm in debt

title: Regenerative medicine company Cesca Therapeutics secures $15mm in debt
text:
Regenerative medicine company Cesca Therapeutics secures $15mm in debt Deal Date: Sep-01-2015 / Deal # 201530670 Executive Summary 
Regenerative medicine company Cesca Therapeutics Inc raised an initial $5.5mm in senior secured debt and will receive another $9.5mm upon the achievement of certain milestones, including approval from the California Institute of Regenerative Medicine of the company's application for matching funds via a CIRM grant. The notes are interest free and can be converted into common shares at a strike price of $0.68. Cesca also issued Series A warrants to purchase up to 22.1mm common shares at $0.68 over 5.5 years, and Series B warrants for up to 12.1mm common shares at $0.68 over 18 months. The proceeds will be used for ongoing clinical initiatives.
